title: Pro Cyclists Are Inhaling Toxic Gas — The UCI Isn’t Happy About It
content:
UCI calls for ban on controversial use of carbon monoxide after revelations that Tour de France-toppers Visma-Lease a Bike and UAE Emirates were tinkering with the toxic gas.

Read the full article at Pro Cyclists Are Inhaling Toxic Gas — The UCI Isn’t Happy About It on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
